|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/09/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 851104001635 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833340009 |asin = B00267353O |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There is no FCC ID printed on the label or on the device... however, the device appears identical to the [[Netcore NW321]] (and shares the Netcore OUI).
